description:
The first 500 people to use our link will get a 1 month free trial of Skillshare https://skl.sh/scishow09241 

There's a scientific reason most hand sanitizers claim they can kill 99.99 percent of germs, and there's only one way to deal with the rest. 

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: Why Can't Hand Sanitizer Kill The 0.01% of Germs?
